item.title: Voltage Reference
item.author: dkozel@bitstovolts.com (Derek Kozel)
item.description: I’m building three voltage references based on the Analog Devices (Linear Tech) LTZ1000. The PCB design is by Branadic and the main LTZ1000 circuit is by Dr Frank, both from the EEVBlog Forum.

item.title: Workstation PC
item.author: dkozel@bitstovolts.com (Derek Kozel)
item.description: The increasing bandwidths of SDR hardware and computational demands of more complex digital communications protocols mean that my hardworking laptop (2013 Lenovo T440p) simply can’t keep up with my needs. Now that I’m also doing increasing amounts of electromagnetic simulations for RF power amplifier design it was really time to get a desktop again.
